verses.verse: The words <WH1697> of king <WH4428> Lemuel <WH3927>, the prophecy <WH4853> that his mother <WH517> taught <WH3256> <WH8765> him.
What, my son <WH1248>? and what, the son <WH1248> of my womb <WH990>? and what, the son <WH1248> of my vows <WH5088> ?
Give <WH5414> <WH8799> not thy strength <WH2428> unto women <WH802>, nor thy ways <WH1870> to that which destroyeth <WH4229> <WH8687> kings <WH4428>.

It is not for kings <WH4428>, O Lemuel <WH3927>, it is not for kings <WH4428> to drink <WH8354> <WH8800> wine <WH3196>; nor for <WH335> <WH8675> <WH176> princes <WH7336> <WH8802> strong drink <WH7941>:
Lest they drink <WH8354> <WH8799>, and forget <WH7911> <WH8799> the Torah <WH2710> <WH8794>, and pervert <WH8138> <WH8762> the judgment <WH1779> of any of the afflicted <WH1121> <WH6040>.
Give <WH5414> <WH8798> strong drink <WH7941> unto him that is ready to perish <WH6> <WH8802>, and wine <WH3196> unto those that be of heavy <WH4751> hearts <WH5315>.
Let him drink <WH8354> <WH8799>, and forget <WH7911> <WH8799> his poverty <WH7389>, and remember <WH2142> <WH8799> his misery <WH5999> no more.
Open <WH6605> <WH8798> thy mouth <WH6310> for the dumb <WH483> in the cause <WH1779> of all such as are appointed <WH1121> to destruction <WH2475>.
Open <WH6605> <WH8798> thy mouth <WH6310>, judge <WH8199> <WH8798> righteously <WH6664>, and plead <WH1777> <WH8798> the cause of the poor <WH6041> and needy <WH34>.
Who can find <WH4672> <WH8799> a virtuous <WH2428> woman <WH802>? for her price <WH4377> is far <WH7350> above rubies <WH6443>.
The heart <WH3820> of her husband <WH1167> doth safely trust <WH982> <WH8804> in her, so that he shall have no need <WH2637> <WH8799> of spoil <WH7998>.
She will do <WH1580> <WH8804> him good <WH2896> and not evil <WH7451> all the days <WH3117> of her life <WH2416>.
She seeketh <WH1875> <WH8804> wool <WH6785>, and flax <WH6593>, and worketh <WH6213> <WH8799> willingly <WH2656> with her hands <WH3709>.
She is like the merchants <WH5503> <WH8802> ' ships <WH591>; she bringeth <WH935> <WH8686> her food <WH3899> from afar <WH4801>.
She riseht <WH6965> <WH8799> also while it is yet night <WH3915>, and giveth <WH5414> <WH8799> meat <WH2964> to her household <WH1004>, and a portion <WH2706> to her maidens <WH5291>.
She considereth <WH2161> <WH8804> a field <WH7704>, and buyeth <WH3947> <WH8799> it: with the fruit <WH6529> of her hands <WH3709> she planteth <WH5193> <WH8804> a vineyard <WH3754>.
She girdeth <WH2296> <WH8804> her loins <WH4975> with strength <WH5797>, and strengtheneth <WH553> <WH8762> her arms <WH2220>.
She perceiveth <WH2938> <WH8804> that her merchandise <WH5504> is good <WH2896>: her candle <WH5216> goeth not out <WH3518> <WH8799> by night <WH3915>.
She layeth <WH7971> <WH8765> her hands <WH3027> to the spindle <WH3601>, and her hands <WH3709> hold <WH8551> <WH8804> the distaff <WH6418>.
She stretcheth out <WH6566> <WH8804> her hand <WH3709> to the poor <WH6041>; yea, she reacheth forth <WH7971> <WH8765> her hands <WH3027> to the needy <WH34>.
She is not afraid <WH3372> <WH8799> of the snow <WH7950> for her household <WH1004>: for all her household <WH1004> are clothed <WH3847> <WH8803> with scarlet <WH8144>.
She maketh <WH6213> <WH8804> herself coverings of tapestry <WH4765>; her clothing <WH3830> is silk <WH8336> and purple <WH713>.
Her husband <WH1167> is known <WH3045> <WH8737> in the gates <WH8179>, when he sitteth <WH3427> <WH8800> among the elders <WH2205> of the land <WH776>.
She maketh <WH6213> <WH8804> fine linen <WH5466>, and selleth <WH4376> <WH8799> it; and delivereth <WH5414> <WH8804> girdles <WH2289> unto the merchant <WH3669>.
Strength <WH5797> and honour <WH1926> are her clothing <WH3830>; and she shall rejoice <WH7832> <WH8799> in time <WH3117> to come <WH314>.
She openeth <WH6605> <WH8804> her mouth <WH6310> with wisdom <WH2451>; and in her tongue <WH3956> is the Torah <WH8451> of kindness <WH2617>.
She looketh well <WH6822> <WH8802> to the ways <WH1979> <WH8675> <WH1979> of her household <WH1004>, and eateth <WH398> <WH8799> not the bread <WH3899> of idleness <WH6104>.
Her children <WH1121> arise up <WH6965> <WH8804>, and call her blessed <WH833> <WH8762>; her husband <WH1167> also, and he praiseht <WH1984> <WH8762> her.
Many <WH7227> daughters <WH1323> have done <WH6213> <WH8804> virtuously <WH2428>, but thou excellest <WH5927> <WH8804> them all.
Favour <WH2580> is deceitful <WH8267>, and beauty <WH3308> is vain <WH1892>: but a woman <WH802> that feareth <WH3373> the YY <WH3068>, she shall be praised <WH1984> <WH8691>.
Give <WH5414> <WH8798> her of the fruit <WH6529> of her hands <WH3027>; and let her own works <WH4639> praise <WH1984> <WH8762> her in the gates <WH8179>.
